sentences.sContent: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.
sentences.sContent_eng: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.

sentences.sContent: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.sContent_eng: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.sCn: 早上没赶上班车，没奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.sContent: He continues up the mountain on foot, in the snow and sleet, and he's getting sick from the cold.
sentences.sContent_eng: He continues up the mountain on foot, in the snow and sleet, and he's getting sick from the cold.
sentences.sCn: 在冰雨的天气里，他继续步行朝着山上前进，因为天气寒冷，他开始变得不舒服了。
